name: Master of Tactics
storyline:
You are the leader of a race who has just discovered technology to travel between the stars. Your job is to explore the galaxy and colonise new Worlds and build a Galactic Empire. 
 
You will find the galaxy is crowded with other races and you will need to compete.
summary:
Master of Tactics is a 4X Turn Based Strategy Game. It is non commercial and free to play with no in game sales. It is heavy on strategy and light on micro management. 
Features include: 
- Random Galaxy Generation 
- Custom Craft Design 
- Tactical Battle System 
- Diplomacy (Espionage, Sabotage, Trading) 
- Strategic Resources 
- Deep Technology Tree
